titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Lesbian and Gay Liberation Collection
titlestmt.author: compiled by staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 11:12

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The Lesbian and Gay Liberation Collection includes publications and ephemera related to the lesbian and gay liberation movements, as well as material related to travel and the arts.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by the Larry Kramer Initiative Executive Coordinator, 2004-2005. Transferred from the Librarian for Gay and Lesbian Studies, 2006-2007 and 2011. Gift of Frank Gagliardi, 2007. Transferred from the LGBT Co-Op, 2009.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Lesbian and Gay Liberation Collection (MS 1846). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Lesbian and Gay Liberation Collection includes publications and ephemera related to the lesbian and gay liberation movements, as well as material related to travel and the arts.
